funFacts.label: Peak PR quarter
funFacts.detail: Q1 came out swinging—launch energy plus rapid-fire fixes set the pace for the year.

funFacts.label: The mega-PR moment
funFacts.detail: One PR in media_analyzer shipped Capsule async support (+89325/-2438)—an actual feature saga in a single merge.

funFacts.label: Review machine
funFacts.detail: You didn’t just ship code—you unblocked the team all year with a steady stream of approvals and sharp comments.

funFacts.label: Top teammate boost
funFacts.detail: Most-reviewed collaborator: @cloudinary-pkoniu (47 reviews). Certified “I’ve got you” energy.

funFacts.label: Low-churn, high-impact
funFacts.detail: Net code growth of 125,289 lines (133,515 added minus 8,226 removed): big builds, minimal thrash.

bigRocks.title: Capsule Goes Async (The Big Bang)
bigRocks.impact: Delivered true asynchronous analysis support for AI Vision + Captioning, unlocking scalable async workflows end-to-end.

bigRocks.title: Captain Crash Gets a Brain (GPT + Context)
bigRocks.impact: Turned incident reporting into a smarter assistant by adding GPT capabilities and richer context providers (Rollbar/Coralogix/ArgoCD).

bigRocks.title: New Analysis Powers: Watermark + IQA
bigRocks.impact: Expanded the platform’s analysis catalog with Watermark Detection and IQA, setting up new product capabilities.

bigRocks.title: Async Responses on S3 (Results, Delivered)
bigRocks.impact: Moved async responses to S3 for reliability and scale, reducing pressure on synchronous pathways.

bigRocks.title: Permission Fortress Upgrades
bigRocks.impact: Strengthened DAM and API permissions enforcement across folders, assets, and resource endpoints—safer defaults, fewer foot-guns.

quarterlyActivity.highlights: Big launches kicked off early—new analysis types, prompt engineering, and the Captain Crash foundation sprint.
Permissions season in cloudinary: enforcement, API correctness, and performance-minded fixes.
Stability arc: edge-case fixes, smarter uploads (HttpSource), and tightening customer-facing errors.
Year-end turbo mode—Capsule async landed, infra scaling tuned, and dl_object_detection reliability upgrades shipped.

topRepos.name: cloudinary
topRepos.funFact: Home base for permissions hardening—folders, assets, metadata, and API endpoints all got safer and sharper.

topRepos.name: media_analyzer
topRepos.funFact: The ‘big build’ repo: from prompt engineering to async S3 pipelines to the massive Capsule async leap.

topRepos.name: captain-crash-lambda
topRepos.funFact: From zero to incident sidekick—context collectors, Slack ergonomics, and GPT-driven summaries.

topRepos.name: dl_object_detection
topRepos.funFact: Reliability & ops glow-up: graceful ECS shutdown, CloudWatch metrics reporting, and e2e stabilization.

topRepos.name: mms-infra
topRepos.funFact: Quiet but critical: scaling rules, shard capacity tuning, and container dependency ordering for safer deploys.

yearInReview.headline: The Year of Async & Reliability
yearInReview.tagline: 207 PRs merged, 133,515 lines added, 269 reviews—shipping big features while keeping systems calm under pressure.
